label: applicableOrganizationalCertification
comment: An organizational certification applicable to this organizational certificate.
An organizational certification applicable to this trade party.

rangeIncludes.comment: The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.

domainIncludes.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
